results.title: The effect of simvastatin, ezetimibe and their combination on the lipid profile, arterial stiffness and inflammatory markers.
results.text_hl: However, increasing the dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ or administering @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@ in combination with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ had no beneficial effects on @<m>DISEASE_Stiff_Skin_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566112 @@@arterial stiffness@@@.

citations.NLM: Efrati S, Averbukh M, Dishy V, Faygenzo M, Friedensohn L, Golik A. The effect of simvastatin, ezetimibe and their combination on the lipid profile, arterial stiffness and inflammatory markers. Eur J Clin Pharmacol. 2007 Feb;63(2):113-21. PMID: 17200833

results.title: Sporadic rippling muscle disease unmasked by simvastatin.

results.title: Inhibition of Atherosclerosis Progression, Intimal Hyperplasia, and Oxidative Stress by Simvastatin and Ivabradine May Reduce Thoracic Aorta's Stiffness in Hypercholesterolemic Rabbits.
results.text_hl: AIMS: This study aims to evaluate @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerosis@@@, oxidative stress, and arterial @<m>DISEASE_Stiff_Skin_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566112 @@@stiffness@@@ attenuation by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Ivabradine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077550 @@@ivabradine@@@ in hyperlipidemic @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbits@@@.

results.title: Ezetimibe and simvastatin reduce inflammation, disease activity, and aortic stiffness and improve endothelial function in rheumatoid arthritis.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVES: The aim of this study was to investigate the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@ on @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@, disease activity, @DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Stiff_Skin_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566112 @@@arterial stiffness@@@ in a cohort of @DISEASE_Arthritis_Rheumatoid @DISEASE_MESH:D001172 @@@rheumatoid arthritis@@@ (@DISEASE_Arthritis_Rheumatoid @DISEASE_MESH:D001172 @@@RA@@@) @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Mäki-Petäjä KM, Booth AD, Hall FC, Wallace SM, Brown J, McEniery CM, Wilkinson IB. Ezetimibe and simvastatin reduce inflammation, disease activity, and aortic stiffness and improve endothelial function in rheumatoid arthritis. J Am Coll Cardiol. 2007 Aug 28;50(9):852-8. PMID: 17719471
